sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { map } from 'rxjs'; import { WeatherService } from '../weather.service'; import { Weather } from '../weatherinfo.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forecast', templateUrl: './forecast.component.html', styleUrls: ['./forecast.component.css'] }) export class ForecastComponent implements OnInit { private zipcode: string = ""; forecast: Forecast; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private weatherService: WeatherService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.route.params.pipe(map(params => { this.zipcode = params['zipcode'] })); this.weatherService.getForecast(this.zipcode).subscribe(response => { this.forecast = response; }); } }

5-day forecast for {{forecast.city.name}}

  • Monday, Mar 23: Rain - Min: 45 - Max: 59
  • Tuesday, Mar 24: Rain - Min: 39 - Max: 52
  • Wednesday, Mar 25: Rain - Min: 36 - Max: 54
  • Thursday, Mar 26: Clear - Min: 37 - Max: 56
  • Friday, Mar 27: Clear - Min: 40 - Max: 57
